title: $:/plugins/test/getplugins
name: GetPlugins
description: Quick access to the online plugins
author: test
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/button":{"title":"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/button","caption":"{{$:/core/images/download-button}} get plugins","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-modal" param="$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Modals/AddPlugins" tooltip={{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Add/Hint}} class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/download-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="get plugins"/> "},"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/history","text":"See [[Releases|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/TiddlyWiki%2520Releases.html]]."},"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/icon","text":"{{$:/core/images/download-button}}"},"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/license","text":"MIT License Copyright (c) 2020-2021 [[test|https://github.com/test]] test@e-mail.com See [[LICENSE|https://github.com/test/tw5-getplugins/blob/master/LICENSE]]"},"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/test/getplugins/readme","text":"A button ({{$:/plugins/test/getplugins/icon}}) in the sidebar page control toolbar for quick access to the online plugins.
* Code: https://github.com/test/tw5-getplugins * Demo: https://test.github.io/tw5-getplugins/"}}}
